review_title: My mind was put at ease! While I recovered, he took care of the rest.
review: Heaton and Associates helped us through a car accident from start to finish. The excellent service we received there put my mind at ease and I was able to focus on recovery while Mr. Heaton took care of the rest. I was never left worrying or wondering where we were at in the case and felt he worked promptly and thoroughly throughout the process. If I ever needed an attorney again, I wouldn't hesitate to use them again!
